original_text:
the princes of Issachar came with Deborah,
    and Issachar faithful to Barak;
    into the valley they rushed at his heels.
Among the clans of Reuben
    there were great searchings of heart.
korean_text: 잇사갈의 방백들이 드보라와 함께 하니 잇사갈과 같이 바락도 그의 뒤를 따라 골짜기로 달려 내려가니 르우벤 시냇가에서 큰 결심이 있었도다

sentences.original_text: the princes of Issachar came with Deborah
into the valley they rushed at his heels
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 뒤를 따라 골짜기로 달려갔으며

sentences.original_text: there were great searchings of heart
